title: New: Flying Lotus – Between Friends (Feat. Earl Sweatshirt)
content:
The latest in the fantastic Adult Swim Singles Program comes from Californian producer Flying Lotus featuring verses from Earl Sweatshirt and the elusive Captain Murphy (rumored to be Aesop Rock).

As genre bending as ever, FlyLo stamps his authority all over the track, with Earl showing Tyler and the rest of Odd Future what it’s like to spit over a cleverly constructed beat once in a while. Check out Between Friends over at this Soundcloud.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
